metadata.title: CVE-2024-38591 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Fix deadlock on SRQ async events.xa_lock for SRQ table may be required in AEQ. Use xa_store_irq()/xa_erase_irq() to avoid deadlock.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-38591` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1098.105').
